short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convenient way to copy and paste characters that aren't present on English keyboards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opening the extension makes a window with the Spanish accented letters and punctuation marks for easy copying and pasting. Allows changing of font size and switching between Arial and Times New Roman. 

Please let me know if I can make this extension more enjoyable to use!

** Some users have reported that this extension doesn't work on ChromeOS. If anyone knows how to solve this or has any feedback, please email me at seancarlson112@gmail.com
